name: SOMNIA - A Dream Reborn
description:
SOMNIA -  A Dream Reborn

In this 2.5D platformer you join a small teddy bear on its journey through a dark nightmare.

Discover and traverse athmospheric 3D environments by utilizing classic 2D sidescrolling controlls.

Learn new abilities and free the butterflies hidden within the world to open new pathways.

Disclaimer: This is a very short gaming experience. You will need between 15 and 30 minutes to complete it. I have worked on it for a while now all on my own. It is my first "complete" game. I had a lot of fun creating it and i would be very happy if you would give it a try (for free of course) and let me know what you think. Thank you.
